name: .JQ2SAVEGAME File Extension
summary: Learn about .JQ2SAVEGAME files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a JQ2SAVEGAME file in Jewel Quest II (Windows), but only on the computer that created the file. If you attempt to move a JQ2SAVEGAME file to a different computer and open it in Jewel Quest II, the saved game the file contains will not appear in Jewel Quest II.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
